results.title: Diabetes of the Exocrine Pancreas Related to Hereditary Pancreatitis, an Update.
results.text_hl: This condition often requires specific interventions: with regard to metabolic control, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is the first choice for those with mild @<m>DISEASE_Maturity_Onset_Diabetes_of_the_Young_Type_8_with_Exocrine_Dysfunction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565225 @@@DEP@@@, and for those in advanced disease, @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ is considered the first-line therapy.

citations.NLM: Ramalho GX, Dytz MG. Diabetes of the Exocrine Pancreas Related to Hereditary Pancreatitis, an Update. Curr Diab Rep. 2020 Mar 28;20(6):16. PMID: 32221727
citations.BibTeX: @article{32221727, title={Diabetes of the Exocrine Pancreas Related to Hereditary Pancreatitis, an Update.}, author={Ramalho GX and Dytz MG}, journal={Curr Diab Rep}, volume={20}, number={6}, pages={16}}

results.title: Diabetes of the exocrine pancreas.
results.text_hl: Once identified, @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Maturity_Onset_Diabetes_of_the_Young_Type_8_with_Exocrine_Dysfunction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565225 @@@DEP@@@ can benefit from specific lifestyle advice, pancreatic enzyme replacement therapy, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment, appropriate @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ dosing, and monitoring.

citations.NLM: Wynne K, Devereaux B, Dornhorst A. Diabetes of the exocrine pancreas. J Gastroenterol Hepatol. 2019 Feb;34(2):346-354. PMID: 30151918
citations.BibTeX: @article{30151918, title={Diabetes of the exocrine pancreas.}, author={Wynne K and Devereaux B and Dornhorst A}, journal={J Gastroenterol Hepatol}, volume={34}, number={2}, pages={346-354}}
